oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pāñḍavānī saṇgāroṇī : manuscript, 1900?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn , active 14th century
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Master Microforms, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in black ink for text, red ink for verse numbers, 11-12 lines per page. Text contained in pages with black ruled lines and red borders.
Appears to have been rebound and repaired; stab-sewn binding, hard board covers lines with red cloth, covers and front few sections separately attached to cloth spine at the head and tail.
Ms. damaged by water, ink occasionally washed away.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
